body.name: Yaheetech Mesh Office Desk Chairs Ergonomic Task Chairs with Adjustable Lumbar Support Mid Back Swivel Chair Purple
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 6 hrs 15 mins.
features: 【Back Height Adjustment】: This multifunctional office chair allows our customers to position the backrest’s lumbar support area within a fixed range for their customized support. This ergonomic feature helps fast forward your office hours throughout a day by releasing the pressure of your back spine with full and customized support to your back and lumbar.

【OPTIMIZED COMFORT】: The seat is soft padded with high-density foam and a double-layer mesh cover to upgrade your sitting experience. Thick padded upholstery is soft to touch and sit, double-layered mesh cover and high-density filler is resilient, which ensures deformation-resistant.

【STURDY & DURABLE】: This office chair is combined of plastic & mesh back, foam-padded seat, steel gas spring and nylon base & wheels. Premium plastic is durable and rust-free, no need to worry about humid environment. Standard market size with great bearing capacity, the maximum capacity of this mesh office chair is 136kg/300lb.

【ADJUSTABLE SEAT HEIGHT】: Seat height of our ergonomic computer chair can be adjusted for 45-55cm/17.7-21.7’’. It has the flexibility to customize our customers’ preferred sitting position according to their needs. Simply pull the lever beneath the seat while sitting if you want to lower the seat.
【Center-Tilt Tension】:Users can choose to tighten or release the tilt tension while rocking back and forth by turning the knob beneath the seat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great chair for Money
reviews.reviewText: We needed two chairs that were comfortable and these hit it out of the park. They’re very comfortable and sturdy and we’re impressed with their design and quality for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and easy to assemble.
reviews.reviewText: Took me about ten minutes to assemble and is almost identical to the one my husband bought at a local office supply store for $200, except this one has more padding in the seat and has more color options. Should he decide to replace his chair, we'll get him one if these in red. The shipping box took a beating, but the items were packed well enough to only sustain minor scuffs. It also took UPS 2 days to deliver when shipping time was predicted to be 7 days, so that was cool. I can see how some people might assemble it incorrectly and get the tilting forward issue, but if you find it tipping forward look at the directions again. You want the round knob at the front and the height adjustment handle at the back on this piece. Also, when assembling any piece of furniture with multiple holes in one part, start the screws, get them most of the way in but still loose. Don't tighten them fully until all of the screws are almost all of the way in. Otherwise you can have mismatched holes that make it hard to get the remaining screws in and you'll have to loosen them to get things lined up. Make sure they are all tightened before sitting in it, otherwise it will fall apart in time. This is probably the 40th chair like this I have assembled and it only took me ten minutes because my cat got involved. Also, I highly recommend you make sure all parts are counted before starting assembly, large and small. It can be quite frustrating if you get 9 screws when you need 10 but you figure it out when you can't find the last one. In this case, they provided 11 of the longer screw when you only need 10, and 5 of the shorter ones when you need 4. Extra parts are nice in case you break or strip a screw out or happen to lose one, I always save them in case I need them for future pieces. Also, never use heavy duty power tools on this kind of stuff, you'll just strip out the screws and maybe break the chair. It comes with the only tool you need anyway, a nice little hex wrench that even my arthritic hands could hold and turn. Just some tips if you aren't as practiced at assembling this kind of stuff.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as a birthday gift for my girlfriend.Pros: The assembly was easy, the comfort was bouncy which she lovedzCons: the arm rest is short and non-adjustable. Once we put it together we realized the discomfort of being able to work comfortably. If for leisure sit down its fine but to use all day for work, the arm rest doesn’t support.Overall, wish they had adjustable arm options. Everything else was perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Chair for the Price - Does Not "Pitch Forward"!
reviews.reviewText: First off the chair arrived in half the time it stated for shipping - which I was happy about. Once assembled (easy), I could tell right away that this chair was far more comfortable than my previous one. The seat foam is soft but still supportive. The back gives goo lumbar support. The entire thing feels sturdy enough even when I lean back. I'm 240 lbs, BTW. Finally, I almost didn't purchase this because of all the reviews that said it "leans forward" or "pitches forward" negative reviews. However, a couple of the pictures in these reviews clearly shows that they have installed the seat backwards on the hardware. Don't let those deter you from this purchase. The pictures in the instructions clearly show they tensioner toward the front of the seat and the adjustment lever on the right side. Those with complaints about the seat "leaning forward" have it on backwards (with the tensioner in the back and the lever to the left).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Price and Comfort
reviews.reviewText: Chair was delivered quickly, exactly as described, easy assemble, and provided good comfort and support.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars cute and easy to put together
reviews.reviewText: For the price this is a nice chair. I purchased two and both were easy to assemble in under an hour. There is no padding on the back, it’s a mesh net type material and I have to put a small pillow on the back for comfort when leaning back in the chair. The screw to attach the arm of the chair on doesn’t screw in and the handle comes off easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I really like this chair, until I sat in it and it went over. Take care to sit all the way to the back of it. My other chair was much sturdier, and the back went back a few inches if you leaned back....this one doesn't. But hey, my other one cost 180.00, this one was 60.... so guess you get what you pay for.... sometimes...lol. Pretty color tho, I got purple.
Very nice colour and very comfortable.
